source:
TEXT_LUCKZE018_03452_SEQ_00 Quest Sync
This well-meaning mentor would ask for your help with unfinished business.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE018_03452_SEQ_00特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト
スリザーバウの若手の導師は、アネモネの捜索を行いたいようだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZE018_03452_TODO_00<tab>Survey the designated areas and slay the anemone should it appear.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE018_03452_TODO_00で見渡し、
が現れたら討伐してアネモネの死骸を入手

source: TEXT_LUCKZE018_03452_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the anemone corpse to the well-meaning mentor.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE018_03452_TODO_01<tab>若手の導師にアネモネの死骸を渡す

source: TEXT_LUCKZE018_03452_MENTOR03452_000_000<tab>Your travels have led you back to Slitherbough, I see. Your timing is fortuitous. Preparations for the anemone hunt are complete. If you are of a mind to join me, your aid would be most appreciated.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE018_03452_MENTOR03452_000_000では、解き放たれたアネモネの捜索を開始しよう。
あの生物は有毒植物や毒蜘蛛を食べる習性があるため、
書記者の樹洞の南西へ向かった可能性がある。

source: TEXT_LUCKZE018_03452_MENTOR03452_000_001<tab>It was last seen in the southwestern region of Cleric. The hunt will prove difficult, however, as that is where the Children chose to build their spiders' nest.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE018_03452_MENTOR03452_000_001あのあたりは毒蜘蛛を飼育する「常闇の愛し子」が多い。
見つかって悪用されたら大変だ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZE018_03452_MENTOR03452_000_002<tab>Tread lightly, and do not hesitate to strike it down on sight. I only ask that you retrieve its corpse should you find it first.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE018_03452_MENTOR03452_000_002アネモネを見つけ次第、倒してくれ。
倒したら死骸を回収するのも忘れずに頼む。
では、手分けして探すとしよう！

source: TEXT_LUCKZE018_03452_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>You see no sign of the anemone. Perhaps you should search elsewhere.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE018_03452_SYSTEM_000_010周囲にアネモネの姿はない……。
別の地点を探そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKZE018_03452_SYSTEM_000_011<tab>You find the corpse of an animal, but there are no signs of a struggle. Perhaps it was killed with poison...
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE018_03452_SYSTEM_000_011毒で倒れたらしき魔物の死骸がある。
しかし、周囲にアネモネの姿はない。
別の地点を探そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKZE018_03452_MENTOR03452_000_020<tab>You are returned. I hope you had better luck than I.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE018_03452_MENTOR03452_000_020お主も戻ったか。
こちらは成果なしだったが、そちらはどうだ？
TEXT_LUCKZE018_03452_MENTOR03452_000_021<tab>おお、アネモネを倒してくれたか！

source: TEXT_LUCKZE018_03452_MENTOR03452_000_022<tab><sigh> Would that there was another way, but the threat it posed to the Greatwood could not be ignored.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE018_03452_MENTOR03452_000_022……このアネモネも蜘蛛も、
毒を持つようになったのは身を護るためだ。
それを人が利用するようになるとは……嫌な世の中だな。

source: TEXT_LUCKZE018_03452_MENTOR03452_000_023<tab>Mark my words: this <var 1A 02 /var>will not<var 1A 01 /var> happen again.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE018_03452_MENTOR03452_000_023アネモネを持ち込むような愚か者が、
また森に入り込まぬよう、警戒を強化することにしよう。
今回は助かった、ありがとう。
